title: [Suggestion] Rotating game modes
body: Start getting feedback on rotating game modes, and either have their frequency based on this feedback, or completely discontinue them based on feedback. This week's mode (and I assume next week's) to me is super awful. It's ARURF without the fun part. I would prefer not to see this game mode again if a majority of others in the community agree. If they don't, so be it. But please, start asking players what they want, because to me this is not it.
